entries.title: Some Marginalia
entries.excerpt: In the spring of 2023, while finishing my English degree at UC Berkeley, I took a course that shifted the way I view the...

entries.title: The Analog Allure in a Digital Age
entries.excerpt: A deep dive into why analog technologies like vinyl, film photography, and print continue to captivate us. Is it nostalgia, or something more profound?

entries.title: Queer Archives & Narrative Power
entries.excerpt: Considering the role of archiving in queer communities and how controlling our narratives shapes identity and resistance. The importance of untold stories.

entries.title: Literary Minimalism: Saying More with Less
entries.excerpt: An examination of minimalist aesthetics in literature. How sparse prose and focused imagery can create powerful emotional and intellectual resonance.
